song.title: Modulating Blues
song.info:
2nd place in Demobit 2017 combined music compo
Written for (the resurrected) Demobit 2017, it has been 13 years since I composed anything.
Direct WAV export from Schism Tracker as I wanted to retain the 'tracker module' sound - no postprocessing done either. Call me old fashioned.
(c) Blue Zone - commercial use prohibited
